entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry Potter, a main character in the story. He is mentioned as being with Dumbledore and Grindelwald in the past.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Gellert Grindelwald, a dark wizard who hurt Ariana. He is mentioned as being present in Harry's memories.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Albus Dumbledore, Harry's mentor and friend. He is mentioned as whispering to Harry and watching Grindelwald hurting Ariana.

entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth Dumbledore, Albus' brother. He is questioning Harry about his brother's intentions.

entities.name: ariana
entities.description: Ariana Dumbledore, Aberforth and Albus' sister. She was hurt by Grindelwald.

relationships.description: Harry is associated with Grindelwald in his memories.
Dumbledore was protecting Ariana from Grindelwald's harm.
Aberforth is questioning Harry about his brother's intentions towards him.
